name: createMorph
description: Tool to create morphological transformations using specified input transforms.

inputs.name: Input Transforms
inputs.description: Input transforms, must specify type (affine, volume, morph, mesh, gcam) with filename.

inputs.name: Output Transform
inputs.description: Output transform file in tm3d format.

inputs.name: Template Volume
inputs.description: Template volume for geometry. Required if a gcam is present.

inputs.name: Debugging Coordinates
inputs.description: Coordinates for debugging purposes. Requires three integer values.

output-files.name: Output Transform File
output-files.description: The resulting output transform file in tm3d format.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
